desc: GoLive® Synbiotic Blends are gut health game changers. Deliciously and meticulously crafted by dietitians, MDs and PhDs with premium probiotics, prebiotics and complementary functional ingredients to give you live & active cultures, as nature intended, for optimal efficacy & impact on digestion, metabolism & immunity.

layout.text: Developed and Formulated by Dietitians, MDs and PhDs. Manufactured in FDA-Regulated Laboratories. Go With Your Gut!®
